text: 2:2 Ua Me Ini 34:12-13; Godɨn Araziba 7:2-5Kamaghɨn, ia gumazamizir nguazir kamɨn itiba ko akar dɨkɨrɨzir gavgavir tam damuan markɨ, kɨ ian anogoroke. Ia men ofa gamir dakozibagh asɨghasɨkigh.’ Kɨ datɨrɨghɨn garima, ia nan Akar Gavgavim barazi puvatɨ. Ia manmaghsua, arazir bar igharazim gami.
